body:
Comment 2 by **swhite@ngmoco.com**: 
I have already tried what you suggested as mentioned in my original report but I have
attached another failing test case with the Files set to []int{0, 1, 2}

Using "tip" on my production server is not an option, but I did try passing the same
option to the os/exec package and it is also broken (but may not support this option in
general).  The new os/exec package does not really do what I need so I would probably
continue to use the syscall.ForkExec in any case.
Attachments: 1. fork_you_ctty.go (332 bytes) 1. exec_you_ctty.go (365 bytes)
